Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Provides for a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or voluntary ambulance services in a certain county
Summary: Provides a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or voluntary ambulance services in counties with a population of more than 290,000 but less than 300,000.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing a tax exemption on real property owned by members of volunteer fire companies or voluntary ambulance services in a certain county
